title: LIAM
overview: An android with the appearance of a teenager named Liam, helped by a group of young people, must escape the laboratory where he was secretly designed if he wants to avoid being reset. What he does not know is that a powerful weapon is hidden deep inside him.Beneath his appearance of a 16-year-old teenager, Liam is in fact an android secretly designed in the World Artificial Intelligence Laboratory. His existence must be revealed at the Belmont science fair, which will bring together young geniuses from all over the world. However, Liam must escape the laboratory, and quickly, because one of his creators, Dr. Wood, wants to reset him since he knows that the android has developed emotions. What Liam does not know is that a powerful weapon is hidden deep inside him. A few kilometers away, far from suspecting the terrible threat that is rumbling, Rafaële, 17, is preparing to welcome the most promising scientists to her father's inn. While she is participating in the inauguration of the science fair, she comes face to face with Liam. A strange connection unites them on the spot. Upset by the young android's dismay, she agrees to help him escape, then to hide him at her home. Lonely and hypersensitive, Rafaële is not convinced that she is the ideal candidate to save humanity. So she decides to turn to her cousin Alexis and the young people she is hosting: Osny, Anne and Rym. Together, they will have to protect Liam, thwart Dr. Wood's plans and lead the investigation to discover the secret hidden in Belmont Forest. What if everything was connected?
